text: Hubert Frans Joanna "Bert" De Coninck (23 June 1949 â€“ 29 November 2024) was a Belgian singer. The Flemish singer was a pioneer of Dutch-language rock and . His greatest successes were during the 1970s and 1980s. He was also a poet. His best-known song is Evelyne. De Coninck died in Lagos in Portugal on 29 November 2024, at the age of 75 years old. ==References== Category:Belgian singers Category:Guitarists Category:Belgian poets Category:1949 births Category:2024 deaths Category:People from Antwerp (province)
title: Bert De Coninck
